body:
One key difference between builds that time out (at kokoro's job timeout of 240min) and those who don't is here:

Passing:
```
...
2017-09-11 03:01:18,489 PASSED: run_tests_php_linux_opt_native [time=37.5sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-11 03:01:18,490 SUCCESS: All run_tests.py instance finished successfully.
I0911 03:01:18.660802  369895 util.py:247] 

[ID: 6931256] SSH command finished after 2456 secs, exit value: 0
```

Timed out: It never prints 2017-09-11 03:01:18,490 SUCCESS: All run_tests.py instance finished successfully, so it might be run_tests_matrix.py hanging upon shutdown. Also, the top-level report from run_tests_matrix.py is missing.
```
017-09-10 06:02:44,643 START: run_tests_php_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 06:03:11,339 PASSED: run_tests_php_linux_opt_native [time=26.7sec; retries=0:0]
...
ERROR: Aborting VM command due to timeout of 14400 seconds
```

Actually, it just looks like `run_tests_python_linux_dbg_native` test suite starts and never finishes.
(and it doesn't get killed by run_tests_matrix.py after it times out for some reason).

```
2017-09-10 05:23:00,979 START: run_tests_sanity_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:23:00,981 START: run_tests_sanity_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 05:32:56,220 PASSED: run_tests_sanity_linux_dbg_native [time=595.2sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:32:56,220 START: run_tests_php7_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:32:58,261 PASSED: run_tests_sanity_linux_opt_native [time=597.3sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:32:58,261 START: run_tests_php7_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 05:34:09,187 PASSED: run_tests_php7_linux_dbg_native [time=73.0sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:34:09,188 START: run_tests_csharp_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:34:09,566 PASSED: run_tests_php7_linux_opt_native [time=71.3sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:34:09,566 START: run_tests_csharp_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 05:36:28,461 PASSED: run_tests_csharp_linux_dbg_native [time=139.3sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:36:28,461 START: run_tests_node_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:36:37,010 PASSED: run_tests_csharp_linux_opt_native [time=147.4sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:36:37,010 START: run_tests_node_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 05:38:34,748 PASSED: run_tests_node_linux_dbg_native [time=126.3sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:38:34,748 START: run_tests_python_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:38:35,339 PASSED: run_tests_node_linux_opt_native [time=118.3sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:38:35,356 START: run_tests_python_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 05:56:25,604 PASSED: run_tests_python_linux_opt_native [time=1070.2sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:56:25,604 START: run_tests_ruby_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 05:59:25,447 PASSED: run_tests_ruby_linux_dbg_native [time=179.8sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 05:59:25,447 START: run_tests_ruby_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 06:02:10,597 PASSED: run_tests_ruby_linux_opt_native [time=165.1sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 06:02:10,597 START: run_tests_php_linux_dbg_native
2017-09-10 06:02:44,643 PASSED: run_tests_php_linux_dbg_native [time=34.0sec; retries=0:0]
2017-09-10 06:02:44,643 START: run_tests_php_linux_opt_native
2017-09-10 06:03:11,339 PASSED: run_tests_php_linux_opt_native [time=26.7sec; retries=0:0]
```

saw same issue here:
https://sponge.corp.google.com/invocation?tab=Kokoro&id=e043326c-da2a-464f-ac53-89ebe31deb9c&searchFor=

this time `run_tests_python_linux_opt_native` never finishes.
